description: X35 console Horizon software crash during boundary recording
recommended_action: Update Horizon to latest version - check SD card integrity - reduce active map layers

description: X25 touchscreen unresponsive in cold temperatures
recommended_action: Allow cab to warm before use - check display operating temp range - update firmware

description: AGI-4 dual antenna heading initialization slow
recommended_action: Verify antenna spacing correct (1 meter min) - check cable connections - clear obstructions
Check antenna cable for damage - verify SBAS satellite visible - update firmware

description: AES-35 hydraulic steering jerky on engage
recommended_action: Recalibrate steering gains - check hydraulic oil level and temp - verify valve kit correct

description: System 350 motor slipping on steering column
recommended_action: Retorque column clamp - inspect adapter ring - check motor gear teeth for wear

description: TopNET Live accuracy dropping to decimeter level
recommended_action: Verify subscription active - check cellular/satellite signal - recycle receiver power

description: Apollo section control valves slow to respond
recommended_action: Check valve wiring - verify CAN communication - inspect valve seats for debris

description: CropSpec sensor readings inconsistent across passes
recommended_action: Clean optical windows - check mounting height consistency - recalibrate baseline

description: Norac ultrasonic sensors giving false readings in tall stubble
recommended_action: Adjust sensor angle - set minimum boom height - switch to crop-sensing mode if available

description: Topcon Ag Cloud sync timeout during large file upload
recommended_action: Check WiFi bandwidth - reduce file size by splitting fields - verify cloud account status

description: Yield monitor calibration drifting during long harvest days
recommended_action: Recalibrate every 4-6 loads - check mass-flow sensor for grain dust buildup
